title: 谁有龙骑士MOD，拿了龙蛋不知道干嘛，急求啊
author: wuzhihao
txt_content: 刚刚打完的末影龙不知道怎么孵化，求一个龙骑士MOD

replies.author: wolski
replies.txt_content:
wuzhihao 发表于 2013-8-16 09:03 
没有，我就是要个MOD
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-73370-1-1.html
拿好

replies.author: ZENONIA4
replies.txt_content: 一般的龙蛋是用里装饰的吧

replies.author: wolski
replies.txt_content: 右键之，注意蛋周围的环境会影响到孵化出来的龙种

replies.author: wuzhihao
replies.txt_content:
